heading: Stormclaw’s Aspect – Diablo 4 Druid Legendary Aspect
content: Stormclaw's Aspect is a Druid Offensive Aspect that can be found by completing the Dungeon as well as from random enemy drops. After clearing the Dungeon for the first time the Aspect will be available in your Codex of Power. Legendary Aspects can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. except with the Letal Shrine. However, it does benefit from , so increased will still benefit it.
